name: All in One Addons For WPBakery Page Builder  (formerly Visual Composer)
author: Labib Ahmed

sections.description:
This plugin contains almost all the addons that are mostly use to build pages.It contains 20+ most using addons for WPBakery Page Builder to build your website in few click.These addons contains very simple and easy settings and new user can easily use it.

Note: This plugin requires WPBakery Page Builder.

Contains Following Addons

  • Banners – Create banner with text over image.
  • Team Showcase – Add your team members with animations.
  • Team Flip Box – Add team members in flip styles with social icons.
  • Pricing Tables – Display pricing with custom options.
  • Image Over Image – Add one image over other with changes on hover.
  • Text Over Image – Display static text over image with animations.
  • Flip Box – Add content in flip book style.
  • 3D Buttons – Add 3D styled buttons.
  • Fancy Buttons – Collection of interactive buttons.
  • Image with Captions – Add text with animated captions and effects.
  • Blockquote – Add quoted text.
  • Tabs – Display your content in tabs.
  • Marquee Text – Add text like news ticker.
  • Youtube Video – Embed Youtube vidoes.
  • Image Slider – Add images in slider with beautiful animations.
  • Seperatore with Icon – Add line seperator after elements with icons.
  • Order Lists – Add ordered listing.
  • Un-Order Lists – Add un-ordered listing.
  • Animation Block – Add animation on any element.
  • Content Cards – Add your content in card style.
  • Social Cards – Create your social account cards
  • Image Overlay – Add overlay text over image.

short_description: Easy solution for building attractive pages with WPBakery Page Builder.
